com.github.dm.jrt.android.v4.stream

Class StreamsCompat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dm.jrt.function.Functions
      • com.github.dm.jrt.stream.Streams
        • com.github.dm.jrt.android.v4.stream.StreamsCompat

  • public class StreamsCompat
extends com.github.dm.jrt.stream.Streams
    Utility class acting as a factory of stream output channels.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 01/04/2016.

    • Nested Class Summary

      static <IN,OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.android.invocation.FunctionContextInvocationFactory<IN,OUT> contextFactory(com.github.dm.jrt.function.Function<? super com.github.dm.jrt.stream.StreamChannel<IN>,? extends com.github.dm.jrt.stream.StreamChannel<? extends OUT>> function)
      Returns an invocation factory, whose invocation instances employ the stream output channels, provided by the specified function, to process input data.
      In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified function must have a static scope.
      The function should return a new instance each time it is called, starting from the passed one.
      static <OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.ext.channel.ChannelsBuilder<? extends LoaderStreamChannelCompat<List<? extends OUT>>> join(com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channel.OutputChannel<?>... channels)
      Returns a builder of loader streams joining the data coming from the specified channels.
      An output will be generated only when at least one result is available for each channel.
      Note that the builder will successfully create only one stream channel instance, and that the passed channels will be bound as a result of the creation.

      Returns a builder of channels making the specified one selectable.
      Each output will be passed along unchanged.
      Note that the builder will successfully create only one stream channel instance, and that the passed channels will be bound as a result of the creation.

      • contextFactory

        @NotNull
public static <IN,OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.android.invocation.FunctionContextInvocationFactory<IN,OUT> contextFactory(@NotNull
                                                                                                            com.github.dm.jrt.function.Function<? super com.github.dm.jrt.stream.StreamChannel<IN>,? extends com.github.dm.jrt.stream.StreamChannel<? extends OUT>> function)
        Returns an invocation factory, whose invocation instances employ the stream output channels, provided by the specified function, to process input data.
        In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified function must have a static scope.
        The function should return a new instance each time it is called, starting from the passed one.
        Type Parameters:
        IN - the input data type.
        OUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        function - the function providing the stream output channels.
        Returns:
        the invocation factory.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class of the specified function has not a static scope.

      • join

        @NotNull
public static <OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.ext.channel.ChannelsBuilder<? extends LoaderStreamChannelCompat<List<? extends OUT>>> join(@Nullable
                                                                                                                         OUT placeholder,
                                                                                                                         @NotNull
                                                                                                                         Collection<? extends com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channel.OutputChannel<? extends OUT>> channels)
        Returns a builder of loader streams joining the data coming from the specified channels.
        An output will be generated only when at least one result is available for each channel. Moreover, when all the output channels complete, the remaining outputs will be returned by filling the gaps with the specified placeholder instance, so that the generated list of data will always have the same size of the channel list.
        Note that the builder will successfully create only one stream channel instance, and that the passed channels will be bound as a result of the creation.
        Type Parameters:
        OUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        placeholder - the placeholder instance.
        channels - the collection of channels.
        Returns:
        the stream channel builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified collection is empty.
        See Also:
        Channels.join(Object, Collection)

        Returns a builder of loader streams joining the data coming from the specified channels.

        @NotNull
public static <OUT> LoaderStreamChannelCompat<OUT> lazyStreamOf(@NotNull
                                                        com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channel.OutputChannel<OUT> output)
        Builds and returns a new lazy loader stream channel generating the specified outputs.
        The stream will start producing results only when it is bound to another channel or an output consumer or when any of the read methods is invoked.

        Note that the output channel will be bound as a result of the call.

        Parameters:

        the newly created stream instance.

        @NotNull
public static <OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.ext.channel.ChannelsBuilder<? extends LoaderStreamChannelCompat<? extends com.github.dm.jrt.android.ext.channel.ParcelableSelectable<OUT>>> merge(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                                                                android.support.v4.util.SparseArrayCompat<? extends com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channel.OutputChannel<? extends OUT>> channels)
        Returns a builder of loader stream merging the specified channels into a selectable one.
        Note that the builder will successfully create only one stream channel instance, and that the passed channels will be bound as a result of the creation.
        Type Parameters:
        OUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        channels - the map of indexes and output channels.
        Returns:
        the selectable stream channel builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified map is empty.
        See Also:
        ChannelsCompat.merge(SparseArrayCompat)

      • onStream

        @NotNull
public static <IN,OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.builder.RoutineBuilder<IN,OUT> onStream(@NotNull
                                                                         com.github.dm.jrt.function.Function<? super com.github.dm.jrt.stream.StreamChannel<IN>,? extends com.github.dm.jrt.stream.StreamChannel<? extends OUT>> function)
        Returns a routine builder, whose invocation instances employ the streams provided by the specified function, to process input data.
        In order to prevent undesired leaks, the class of the specified function must have a static scope.
        The function should return a new instance each time it is called, starting from the passed one.
        Type Parameters:
        IN - the input data type.
        OUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        function - the function providing the stream output channels.
        Returns:
        the routine builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class of the specified function has not a static scope.

      • repeat

        @NotNull
public static <OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.ext.channel.ChannelsBuilder<? extends LoaderStreamChannelCompat<OUT>> repeat(@NotNull
                                                                                                           com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channel.OutputChannel<OUT> channel)
        Returns a builder of streams repeating the output data to any newly bound channel or consumer, thus effectively supporting binding of several output consumers.
        Note that the builder will successfully create only one stream channel instance, and that the passed channels will be bound as a result of the creation.
        Type Parameters:
        OUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        channel - the output channel.
        Returns:
        the repeating stream channel builder.
        See Also:
        com.github.dm.jrt.android.v4.ext.channel.ChannelsCompat#repeat(OutputChannel)

      • selectParcelable

        @NotNull
public static <OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.ext.channel.ChannelsBuilder<? extends android.support.v4.util.SparseArrayCompat<LoaderStreamChannelCompat<OUT>>> selectParcelable(int startIndex,
                                                                                                                                                                int rangeSize,
                                                                                                                                                                @NotNull
                                                                                                                                                                com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channel.OutputChannel<? extends com.github.dm.jrt.android.ext.channel.ParcelableSelectable<? extends OUT>> channel)
        Returns a builder of maps of loader stream channels returning the output data filtered by the specified indexes.
        Note that the builder will return the same map for the same inputs and equal configuration, and that the passed channels will be bound as a result of the creation.
        Type Parameters:
        OUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        startIndex - the selectable start index.
        rangeSize - the size of the range of indexes (must be positive).
        channel - the selectable channel.
        Returns:
        the map of indexes and output channels builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified range size is negative or 0.
        See Also:
        com.github.dm.jrt.ext.channel.Channels#select(int, int, OutputChannel)

      • toSelectable

        @NotNull
public static <OUT> com.github.dm.jrt.ext.channel.ChannelsBuilder<? extends LoaderStreamChannelCompat<? extends com.github.dm.jrt.android.ext.channel.ParcelableSelectable<OUT>>> toSelectable(@NotNull
                                                                                                                                                                                       com.github.dm.jrt.channel.Channel.OutputChannel<? extends OUT> channel,
                                                                                                                                                                                       int index)
        Returns a builder of channels making the specified one selectable.
        Each output will be passed along unchanged.
        Note that the builder will successfully create only one stream channel instance, and that the passed channels will be bound as a result of the creation.
        Type Parameters:
        OUT - the output data type.
        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to make selectable.
        index - the channel index.
        Returns:
        the selectable loader stream builder.
        See Also:
        com.github.dm.jrt.android.v4.ext.channel.ChannelsCompat#toSelectable(OutputChannel, int)
